content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available in your inventory or produced by a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
